title: Inception
plot: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception â€” planting an idea into someone's subconscious.
author: Christopher Nolan
short-description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller about dreams within dreams.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
author: Christopher Nolan
short-description: Batman faces his greatest challenge in the Joker.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
author: Quentin Tarantino
short-description: A nonlinear crime masterpiece.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
author: Frank Darabont
short-description: A powerful story of hope and friendship in prison.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
author: Francis Ford Coppola
short-description: The epic tale of the Corleone crime family.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
author: David Fincher
short-description: A dark satire of consumer culture and masculinity.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
author: Robert Zemeckis
short-description: Life is like a box of chocolates.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
author: Lana & Lilly Wachowski
short-description: Red pill or blue pill?

title: Parasite
plot: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household and infiltrate their lives with unexpected consequences.
author: Bong Joon-ho
short-description: A darkly comedic thriller exploring class divide.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
author: Christopher Nolan
short-description: A cosmic journey through space and time.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.
author: Jonathan Demme
short-description: Hannibal Lecter's chilling psychological game.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
author: Ridley Scott
short-description: Strength and honor in ancient Rome.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
author: Peter Jackson
short-description: An epic fantasy adventure begins.

title: Titanic
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
author: James Cameron
short-description: A timeless love story on a doomed ship.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions.
author: Anthony & Joe Russo
short-description: The epic conclusion to the Infinity Saga.

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.
author: Hayao Miyazaki
short-description: A beautiful animated fantasy adventure.

title: Joker
plot: A mentally troubled stand-up comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.
author: Todd Phillips
short-description: The origin story of Batman's greatest nemesis.

title: The Lion King
plot: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
author: Roger Allers & Rob Minkoff
short-description: Disney's animated masterpiece about the circle of life.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
author: Damien Chazelle
short-description: A brutal exploration of ambition and perfectionism.

title: Get Out
plot: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.
author: Jordan Peele
short-description: A horror satire on racism in America.

title: Dangal
plot: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become India's first world-class female wrestlers.
author: Nitesh Tiwari
short-description: A true story of wrestling glory and gender barriers.

title: 3 Idiots
plot: Two friends search for their long-lost companion, whose free-spirited nature and out-of-the-box thinking inspired them at engineering college.
author: Rajkumar Hirani
short-description: A comedy about education, friendship, and thinking differently.

title: Andhadhun
plot: A blind pianist unwittingly becomes entangled in a murder mystery, where nothing is as it seems.
author: Sriram Raghavan
short-description: A dark comedy-thriller with shocking twists.

title: Taare Zameen Par
plot: A dyslexic child finds hope when an unconventional teacher helps him unlock his potential through art.
author: Aamir Khan
short-description: A heartwarming tale about learning differences.

title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
plot: A wealthy family's bonds are tested when the patriarch disowns his adopted son for marrying beneath his status.
author: Karan Johar
short-description: Bollywood's ultimate family drama with grand emotions.

title: Lagaan
plot: In 1893, villagers in British India challenge their oppressors to a game of cricket to avoid oppressive taxes.
author: Ashutosh Gowariker
short-description: An underdog sports epic set in colonial India.

title: PK
plot: An alien stranded on Earth questions religious dogmas, exposing human hypocrisy with innocent curiosity.
author: Rajkumar Hirani
short-description: A satirical take on religion and blind faith.
